revised_title: Dispersion of Optic Axes in Harmotome and Wöhlerite: Proving Their Belonging to the Clinorhombic System
tldr: The author investigates the dispersion of optic axes in Harmotome and Wöhlerite minerals and concludes that they belong to the clinorhombic system. The study involves examining the optical properties and crystal forms of these minerals, providing a more accurate crystallographic description.
